review:
I went to her for my mother's concerns. I was also facing some urological issues. Eventually, I told her about it. She is one of the  honest doctor I have  met in my life. I was on some medications and my problem was just the side effect of SSRIs. Other urologists told me to do a bundles of tests.... But She told me to talk to my doctor for alternative medications. Now it's been 1 month after successfully tapering off and changing the med I have recovered completely. Thank you very much ma'am for your heartiest help..She not only save my money but also my time. Indeed She is a true Doctor with her extraordinary smile. Lot's of love to her.. 💐😄
 I definitely recommend her to treat your Urogynecological problems.

My mummy's treatment was done by her! And I personally wanna Thank her so much She is a kind doctor... Everything was explained so properly and my mummy is getting better day by day only because of you mam❤️.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I came here in Womens hospital ,Apollo for my wife's treatment and I consulted Dr. Alpa Khakhar ma'am. She is a very kind and a Generous dr I must say.She exclaimed ous each & every thing in a very smoothly about the treatment.. We r highly satisfied and thankful to the Dr. Alpa ma'am..Ee will highly recommend to our family and friends for her consultation 🙏🏻

I had been to hospital and it was for gynaecology related. Doctor was good in consulting me. I am satisfied with the explanation and treatment given by the doctor. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor and course is not completed. Blood test was done and It was normal. There was no waiting time in the hospital when we went.
